snippet: Jean-Victor Meyers, the grandson of Liliane Bettencourt, has been appointed to the board, beginning his role as the family heir.
abstract: Jean-Victor Meyers, the 25-year-old grandson of L'Oreal matriarch Liliane Bettencourt, has been appointed to the board, beginning his role as the family heir; Bettencourt gave up her board seat after a bitter family fight that captivated France; Meyers's entree onto the board comes at a pivotal time for the family and for the company, which had a record 20 billion euros in global sales in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Jean-Victor Meyers, the grandson of Liliane Bettencourt, has been appointed to the board, beginning his role as the family heir.

headline.seo: Jean-Victor Meyers: The New Prince of L’Oréal
